about_the_game:
Wanting to take revenge on Sultan Mehmed, Vlad blows the magic pipe entrusted to him by his ancestors from an ancient tower in the capital of the empire, resurrecting the sleeping dead in the city and starting a massive zombie invasion in the capital. Our heroes are the special elite unit of the empire, "k.o.c." agents, carefully selected characters from different races and geographies, are responsible for protecting the capital and especially the sultan against this zombie invasion...

The classic beat em up game is now here with the medieval Ottoman theme, with unique features offered by the unreal engine and magnificent illustrative drawings! Dash towards the zombies, fight with your own combinations and save the capital from zombies again!

We will relase a beta gameplay demo for your feedback soon! Add to your wishlist!
detailed_description:
Wanting to take revenge on Sultan Mehmed, Vlad blows the magic pipe entrusted to him by his ancestors from an ancient tower in the capital of the empire, resurrecting the sleeping dead in the city and starting a massive zombie invasion in the capital. Our heroes are the special elite unit of the empire, "k.o.c." agents, carefully selected characters from different races and geographies, are responsible for protecting the capital and especially the sultan against this zombie invasion...

The classic beat em up game is now here with the medieval Ottoman theme, with unique features offered by the unreal engine and magnificent illustrative drawings! Dash towards the zombies, fight with your own combinations and save the capital from zombies again!

We will relase a beta gameplay demo for your feedback soon! Add to your wishlist!
name: KEEPERS 1477

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10,11
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: gtx 970 or equvalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10,11
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: rtx and equivalent recommended
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The classic beat em up game is now here with the medieval Ottoman theme, with 3d environment and unique features offered by the unreal engine and its physics engine, magnificent illustrative drawings! Dash towards the zombies, fight with your own combinations and save the capital from zombies!
